name: Gluttony Demo
description:
Play as Beelzebub, the demon of Gluttony.  Fight alongside humans, demons, and even angels to take the throne and bridge the divide between the three realms!  Power up Beelzebub by turning enemies into snacks!

Controls:

Z/Enter/Space/Left click/tap: Select/Interact

X/Esc/Right click/two-finger tap: Cancel/Back/Menu

Arrow Keys/left click/tap: Move
